meanings.definition: Thinking about something constantly or frequently
meanings.sent1: She has an obsessive need to check her phone every few minutes.
meanings.sent2: His obsessive focus on his work often leads to great results.
meanings.sent3: Her obsessive love for chocolate sometimes gets her into trouble.
meanings.sent4: The idea of success became an obsessive pursuit for him.
meanings.sent5: The detective's obsessive attention to detail helped solve the case.

meanings.definition: Compulsive or excessive in behavior or thought
meanings.sent1: He has an obsessive need to organize everything in his room.
meanings.sent2: Her obsessive cleaning habits sometimes annoy her roommates.
meanings.sent3: His obsessive need to win every game can be quite competitive.
meanings.sent4: The company's obsessive focus on customer satisfaction sets them apart.
meanings.sent5: The artist's obsessive dedication to his craft is truly inspiring.

meanings.sent3: The song's catchy tune became an obsessive in her mind.
meanings.sent4: The idea of failure became an obsessive that haunted him.
